3   He heals the brokenhearted
    and binds up their wounds.
verses.kjv: 3 He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
verses.niv: 3 He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

verses.esv: 24 He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree, that we might die to sin and live to righteousness. By his wounds you have been healed.
verses.kjv: 24 Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
verses.niv: 24 He himself bore our sins in his body on the tree, so that we might die to sins and live for righteousness; by his wounds you have been healed.

verses.esv:
17   For I will restore health to you,
    and your wounds I will heal,
      declares the LORD,
  because they have called you an outcast:
    ‘It is Zion, for whom no one cares!’
verses.kjv: 17 For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the LORD; because they called thee an Outcast, saying, This is Zion, whom no man seeketh after.
verses.niv: 17 But I will restore you to health and heal your wounds,' declares the LORD, 'because you are called an outcast, Zion for whom no one cares.'

verses.esv: 34 He went to him and bound up his wounds, pouring on oil and wine. Then he set him on his own animal and brought him to an inn and took care of him.
verses.kjv: 34 And went to him, and bound up his wounds, pouring in oil and wine, and set him on his own beast, and brought him to an inn, and took care of him.
verses.niv: 34 He went to him and bandaged his wounds, pouring on oil and wine. Then he put the man on his own donkey, took him to an inn and took care of him.

verses.esv:
5   But he was pierced for our transgressions;
    he was crushed for our iniquities;
  upon him was the chastisement that brought us peace,
    and with his wounds we are healed.
verses.kjv: 5 But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
verses.niv: 5 But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was upon him, and by his wounds we are healed.

verses.esv:
6   From the sole of the foot even to the head,
    there is no soundness in it,
  but bruises and sores
    and raw wounds;
  they are not pressed out or bound up
    or softened with oil.
verses.kjv: 6 From the sole of the foot even unto the head there is no soundness in it; but wounds, and bruises, and putrifying sores: they have not been closed, neither bound up, neither mollified with ointment.
verses.niv: 6 From the sole of your foot to the top of your head there is no soundness- only wounds and welts and open sores, not cleansed or bandaged or soothed with oil.

verses.esv: 26 saying, “If you will diligently listen to the voice of the LORD your God, and do that which is right in his eyes, and give ear to his commandments and keep all his statutes, I will put none of the diseases on you that I put on the Egyptians, for I am the LORD, your healer.”
verses.kjv: 26 And said, If thou wilt diligently hearken to the voice of the LORD thy God, and wilt do that which is right in his sight, and wilt give ear to his commandments, and keep all his statutes, I will put none of these diseases upon thee, which I have brought upon the Egyptians: for I am the LORD that healeth thee.
verses.niv: 26 He said, "If you listen carefully to the voice of the LORD your God and do what is right in his eyes, if you pay attention to his commands and keep all his decrees, I will not bring on you any of the diseases I brought on the Egyptians, for I am the LORD, who heals you."

verses.esv:
30   Blows that wound cleanse away evil;
    strokes make clean the innermost parts.
verses.kjv: 30 The blueness of a wound cleanseth away evil: so do stripes the inward parts of the belly.
verses.niv: 30 Blows and wounds cleanse away evil, and beatings purge the inmost being.

verses.esv:
14   Heal me, O LORD, and I shall be healed;
    save me, and I shall be saved,
    for you are my praise.
verses.kjv: 14 Heal me, O LORD, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved: for thou art my praise.
verses.niv: 14 Heal me, O LORD, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

verses.esv:
17   When the righteous cry for help, the LORD hears
    and delivers them out of all their troubles.
18   The LORD is near to the brokenhearted
    and saves the crushed in spirit.
19   Many are the afflictions of the righteous,
    but the LORD delivers him out of them all.
20   He keeps all his bones;
    not one of them is broken.
verses.kjv: 17 The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles. 18 The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit. 19 Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all. 20 He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.
verses.niv: 17 The righteous cry out, and the LORD hears them; he delivers them from all their troubles. 18 The LORD is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit. 19 A righteous man may have many troubles, but the LORD delivers him from them all; 20 he protects all his bones, not one of them will be broken.

verses.esv:
3   The LORD sustains him on his sickbed;
    in his illness you restore him to full health.
verses.kjv: 3 The LORD will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.
verses.niv: 3 The LORD will sustain him on his sickbed and restore him from his bed of illness.

verses.esv: 9 But he said to me, “My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.” Therefore I will boast all the more gladly of my weaknesses, so that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
verses.kjv: 9 And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
verses.niv: 9 But he said to me, "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness." Therefore I will boast all the more gladly about my weaknesses, so that Christ's power may rest on me.

verses.esv:
2   Be gracious to me, O LORD, for I am languishing;
    heal me, O LORD, for my bones are troubled.
verses.kjv: 2 Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
verses.niv: 2 Be merciful to me, LORD, for I am faint; O LORD, heal me, for my bones are in agony.

verses.esv:
22   A joyful heart is good medicine,
    but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
verses.kjv: 22 A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
verses.niv: 22 A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

verses.esv: 34 And he said to her, “Daughter, your faith has made you well; go in peace, and be healed of your disease.”
verses.kjv: 34 And he said unto her, Daughter, thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace, and be whole of thy plague.
verses.niv: 34 He said to her, "Daughter, your faith has healed you. Go in peace and be freed from your suffering."

verses.esv: 1:1 The elder to the beloved Gaius, whom I love in truth.
verses.kjv: 2 Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.
verses.niv: 1 The elder, To my dear friend Gaius, whom I love in the truth.

verses.esv: 7 casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.
verses.kjv: 7 Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
verses.niv: 7 Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

verses.esv: 19 And my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 19 But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 19 And my God will meet all your needs according to his glorious riches in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, 20 for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.
verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? 20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.
verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; 20 you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your body.

verses.esv:
4   Surely he has borne our griefs
    and carried our sorrows;
  yet we esteemed him stricken,
    smitten by God, and afflicted.
5   But he was pierced for our transgressions;
    he was crushed for our iniquities;
  upon him was the chastisement that brought us peace,
    and with his wounds we are healed.
verses.kjv: 4 Surely he hath borne our griefs, and carried our sorrows: yet we did esteem him stricken, smitten of God, and afflicted. 5 But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
verses.niv: 4 Surely he took up our infirmities and carried our sorrows, yet we considered him stricken by God, smitten by him, and afflicted. 5 But he was pierced for our transgressions, he was crushed for our iniquities; the punishment that brought us peace was upon him, and by his wounds we are healed.

verses.esv: 14 if my people who are called by my name humble themselves, and pray and seek my face and turn from their wicked ways, then I will hear from heaven and will forgive their sin and heal their land.
verses.kjv: 14 If my people, which are called by my name, shall humble themselves, and pray, and seek my face, and turn from their wicked ways; then will I hear from heaven, and will forgive their sin, and will heal their land.
verses.niv: 14 if my people, who are called by my name, will humble themselves and pray and seek my face and turn from their wicked ways, then will I hear from heaven and will forgive their sin and will heal their land.

verses.esv: 14 Is anyone among you sick? Let him call for the elders of the church, and let them pray over him, anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord. 15 And the prayer of faith will save the one who is sick, and the Lord will raise him up. And if he has committed sins, he will be forgiven.
verses.kjv: 14 Is any sick among you? let him call for the elders of the church; and let them pray over him, anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord: 15 And the prayer of faith shall save the sick, and the Lord shall raise him up; and if he have committed sins, they shall be forgiven him.
verses.niv: 14 Is any one of you sick? He should call the elders of the church to pray over him and anoint him with oil in the name of the Lord. 15 And the prayer offered in faith will make the sick person well; the Lord will raise him up. If he has sinned, he will be forgiven.

verses.esv: 6 Behold, I will bring to it health and healing, and I will heal them and reveal to them abundance of prosperity and security.
verses.kjv: 6 Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.
verses.niv: 6 "'Nevertheless, I will bring health and healing to it; I will heal my people and will let them enjoy abundant peace and security.

verses.esv:
28   A dishonest man spreads strife,
    and a whisperer separates close friends.
verses.kjv: 28 A froward man soweth strife: and a whisperer separateth chief friends.
verses.niv: 28 A perverse man stirs up dissension, and a gossip separates close friends.

verses.esv:
2   Bless the LORD, O my soul,
    and forget not all his benefits,
3   who forgives all your iniquity,
    who heals all your diseases,
4   who redeems your life from the pit,
    who crowns you with steadfast love and mercy,
verses.kjv: 2 Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits: 3 Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases; 4 Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;
verses.niv: 2 Praise the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits- 3 who forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases, 4 who redeems your life from the pit and crowns you with love and compassion,
